  1. Home

Upon the issuance of a citation, the Defendant has 30 days to address the court and enter a plea to the charges. Signing the citation is your indication that you “ ” the 30 days. Please wait 2-3 business days after receiving a citation before contacting the court, to allow entry of the citation.

View the alleged charge(s) online at https://www.govrec.com/home/romanforestcitx . Defendants may pay online with a plea and waiver of a jury trial. Paying the ticket prompts the court, if required, to report the violation as a conviction to the TX Department of Public Safety.
